mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (usePoint, o_comment, o_enroll, o_state, deliverCost, addressee, address, o_phone, id) SELECT 4000, #{o_comment}, NOW(), "배송준비", 0, #{addressee}, #{address}, #{o_phone}, #{id}
mapper.select: select * from product p, orders o, ordersitem oi where o.orders_id = oi.orders_id and oi.product_id = p.product_id and o.id = #{id} order by o.o_enroll, o.orders_id desc
